title: Stratos 4 Advance Kanketsuhen
alternative_title: ストラトス・フォー アドヴァンス 完結編
description: A crisis is approaching, and meanwhile, the higher-ups are plotting behind everybody's backs. Plans of a massive comet interception mission involving both Comet Blasters and Meteor Sweepers' MiG-31MS and TSR-2MS are being prepared. But will the plan succeed? Is it tears of sorrow or laughter and joy that await the team of four beauties from Shimojijima Base?
